results.author: Helmut Sdjasdna
results.Content: The biggest room in the world is room for improvement.

results.author: Albert Einstein
results.Content: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

results.author: Maya Angelou
results.Content: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.Content: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

results.author: Thomas Edison
results.Content: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.

results.author: Socrates
results.Content: The unexamined life is not worth living.

results.author: Michael Jordan
results.Content: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game-winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

results.author: Dalai Lama
results.Content: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.

results.author: Nelson Mandela
results.Content: Do not judge me by my successes, judge me by how many times I fell down and got back up again.

results.author: Confucius
results.Content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

results.author: Maya Angelou
results.Content: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.

results.author: Albert Einstein
results.Content: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

results.author: Socrates
results.Content: The unexamined life is not worth living.

results.author: Thomas Edison
results.Content: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.Content: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

results.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
results.Content: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.

results.author: Vince Lombardi
results.Content: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.

results.author: Helen Keller
results.Content: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.

results.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
results.Content: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

results.author: Zig Ziglar
results.Content: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

results.author: Oprah Winfrey
results.Content: You don’t become what you want, you become what you believe.

results.author: Nelson Mandela
results.Content: It always seems impossible until it’s done.

results.author: Mark Twain
results.Content: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.

results.author: Michael Jordan
results.Content: I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

results.author: Babe Ruth
results.Content: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.

results.author: Mahatma Gandhi
results.Content: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.

results.author: B.C. Forbes
results.Content: It is only the farmer who faithfully plants seeds in the Spring, who reaps a harvest in the Autumn.

results.author: John Wooden
results.Content: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
